mean_cn: n. 次优级抵押贷款，次贷
mean_en: connected with the practice of lending money to people who may not be able to pay the money back, because they have a bad credit rating
sentence: Subprime loans have high interest rates and are provided to those with bad credit ratings.
sentence_trans: 次级抵押贷款有很高的利息并被提供给信用评分较差的贷款人。
